text: Fernando Cardenal Mart√≠nez (26 January 1934 - 20 February 2016) was a Nicaraguan Jesuit and liberation theologian. He served as Minister of Education from 1984 to 1990, during the Sandinista era. His brother, poet Ernesto Cardenal, also a Catholic priest, served as Minister of Culture from 1979 to 1987. He was born in Granada, Nicaragua. Cardenal died in Managua from heart failure on 20 February 2016.
